location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from slight pest damage; a hole in the folio has partially obscured the date of the letter the Resident is replying to, leaving 25th ...ary.

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of a letter dated 25 January or February giving cover to a letter from the Advocate General concerning the detention of Shaikh ‘Abd al-Rasūl Khān's vessel.
